long_description: With a waterproof, breathable shell and Thinsulate(R) insulation, the Oakley Minaret insulated jacket offers warm protection and good-looking style while you get after it on the ski hill. Waterproof, breathable laminated shell with the critical seams taped keeps you warm and dry in inclement weather. 80g Thinsulate(R) insulation in the body and 60g in the hood and sleeves prevent winter weather from chilling you to the bone. Durable Water Repellent finish on the polyester shell causes water to bead up and roll off. Internal, adjustable powder skirt helps seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth; powder skirt connects to compatible Oakley pants (sold separately). Pit zippers let you vent body heat quickly. Exterior zippered hand pockets and chest pocket hold your essentials; interior elastic pocket keeps a digital music player or cell phone secure. Route your headphones through the buttonhole port to listen to music while your device stays securely stowed inside the jacket. Oakley Minaret insulated jacket has a regular fit.
short_description: With a waterproof, breathable shell and Thinsulate(R) insulation, the Oakley Minaret insulated jacket offers warm protection and good-looking style while you get after it on the ski hill.
